sentence: Reps. Ronny Jackson (R., Texas), Mr. Trumps former White House doctor, and Lauren Boebert (R., Colo.) received donations, as did Senate candidates Rep. Mo Brooks (R., Ala.) and Herschel Walker, among others.
author: Chad Day
title: Trump Reports $122 Million Political War Chest as He Weighs 2024 Bid

sentence: Kevin Stitt, a Republican, is seeking a second term.? DAY IN COURT Thomas Poses With Senate Candidate Walker in Supreme Court Photo,? by Greg Stohr, Bloomberg: Justice Clarence Thomas spent time at the U.S. Supreme Court this week with Republican U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker, posing for a photo tweeted out by the former football stars campaign spokesperson.
title: Crypto's campaign year

sentence: The Washington Post asked Save America to provide winners for other contests it has held, which included meeting the president at a rally in South Carolina this weekend, meeting Trump at his palatial Florida club last year, playing golf with Trump and Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker in Palm Beach, or receiving commemorative memorabilia such as a football signed by Trump and Walker, a College Football Hall of Famer.
title: Trump touted a contest for small-dollar donors to dine with him in New Orleans. But no winner met him.

sentence: The Senate Leadership Fund will drop $37.1 million there, likely to bolster former NFL running back Herschel Walker (R), who still faces a Republican primary later this year.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Senate GOP super PAC books $141 million in TV ads

sentence: FIRST ON FOX: A super PAC supporting Georgia GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker is spending more than $50,000 on a billboard campaign attacking Sen. Raphael Warnock over inflation and gas prices as the midterms loom later this year.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Pro-Herschel Walker PAC hits Warnock over gas prices, inflation in billboard ads

sentence: (Twitter/Matt Corley of Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington) Biden to hold first road fundraisers of presidency (Axios) Ex-Rep. Pete King registers as lobbyist for facility accused of torturing children (LegiStorm) Gyms, restaurants, music venues among those seeking billions in pandemic relief (The Hill) Bank records shed light on dark-money group in Florida ghost candidate scandal (Tampa Bay Times) Herschel Walker Claims to Own Companies That Dont Exist (The Daily Beast) An 83-year-old California man was sentenced to 3.5 years in prison after stealing more than $250,000 by pretending to raise money for Bernie Sanders, Beto ORourke and others (Insider) In Closing I own that so I pay myself (ha ha!)
author: Zach Everson
title: Checks And Imbalances: The Reporter's Notebook Edition

sentence: Less than two months ago, State Agricultural Commissioner Gary Black was trailing former football star Herschel Walker in the Republican Senate primary when he told a rally in Putnam County that he didn't think there was any chance Walker could beat incumbent Democrat Raphael Warnock in the fall.
author: Bill Powell
title: Why Did It Take the GOP So Long to Panic About Herschel Walker?
